message: This offer represents a fair split considering the diminishing value of money with each round. Please consider accepting.
You're starting strong, but I think I can do better!
Considering the inflation, I propose a more equitable distribution. This offer aims to balance our shares while accounting for the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'm not giving up yet. This offer is my best so far, but I'm willing to negotiate.
I believe a 50/50 split is fair given the circumstances. This proposal aims to ensure that we both receive an equal share of the remaining funds.
I'm getting closer to what I want. You're getting closer to what you want. Let's meet in the middle...
